snippet.title: HEART FRAGMENT TRAILER | PSYCHOLOGICAL OTOME GAME | COMING JULY 30, 2021
snippet.description:
Can you collect all of the fragments, solve the mysteries, and find your way to a happy ending? 

In this mysterious psychological otome game, play as a protagonist (name customizable but "Xani" by default) struggling to cope with the hand life has dealt you. Your mother's death was a tragedy, and left you cynical and numb to the world. Now, though, greater challenges are piling up fast - and it all begins when you find out you are not entirely human.

The disappearance of a friend. A sudden attack that leaves you wounded. Mysterious characters entering and leaving your life. Growing bonds. Coming to terms with what exactly "humanity" is...

Please. Find a happy ending. Don't let tragedy be the only option.

BOOK ONE - "FANTASY FRAGMENTS" (KAY & CLIVE) - RELEASING JULY 30, 2021 - DEMO AVAILABLE NOW

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1253880/Heart_Fragment/
Itch: https://heartfragment.itch.io/heartfragment

Written & directed by Casper Swann
Featuring artwork from Momoriin (sprites), Mintstea & Strawberristorm (CGs), and vellaude (mini chibi CGs)
Opening song features "Dancing in the Dying Light" by Amarante
With trailer editing by Shiki
